entities.name: him
entities.description: The person being referred to is not specified, but it is implied that they are a significant figure in the story.

entities.name: Bill
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who decides to come and see everyone off at King's Cross station.

entities.name: Charlie
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends who decides to come and see everyone off at King's Cross station.

entities.name: Percy
entities.description: Harry's friend who apologizes for not being able to take time off to go with them.

entities.name: Mr. Crouch
entities.description: A person at the Ministry who relies on Percy.

entities.name: George
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who makes a comment about Percy's name being known soon.

entities.name: Mrs. Weasley
entities.description: Harry's mother figure who orders taxis to take them into London.

entities.name: Arthur
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley's husband who tried to borrow Ministry cars for them.

entities.name: Dark wizards
entities.description: A group of people with dark magic powers that the person being referred to is paranoid about.

relationships.description: Percy relies on Mr. Crouch, as he mentions that Mr. Crouch is really starting to rely on him.
George makes a comment about Percy's name being known soon.
